text:
Biologist and Master in Natural Sciences with a passion for the world of microbial communities and the use of bioinformatics as a tool for researching the biological and evolutionary features of different microorganisms.

Research Experience

Participated in projects on genomic surveillance of emerging pathogens, including SARS-CoV-2 and Monkeypox virus.

Conducted molecular and bioinformatic analyses on different microbes using Sanger, Illumina or Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT)

Research Interests

Computational Metagenomics
Epidemiology and zoonotic diseases
Data analytics in life sciences

Here


Geographic and geospatial analyses of COVID-19 in Colombia: Trends in case distribution, recovery, and mortality (2023‚Äì2024)
This project consists in an interactive dashboard that allow to explore the evolution of cases, recovering, and deaths at geographic (Departments and Municipalities), demographic (Age, Sex, ethnic group), and clinic (patient status and type of infection) level.
Objectives of the analysis:

Visualizar din√°micas mensuales y anuales

üëã Welcome
I‚Äôm a Bioinformatician and Data Analyst with experience in microbiome analysis, ecological modeling, and health data visualisation. I combine scripting in R and Bash with strong analytical workflows to generate reproducible insights from complex datasets.
